nodes.title: HTML Structure
nodes.desc: Understand the basic structure of an HTML document, including the doctype, html, head, and body tags. [W3Schools](https://www.w3schools.com/html/html_basic.asp)

nodes.title: HTML Tags
nodes.desc: Learn about the different types of HTML tags, including headings, paragraphs, links, images, and more. [MDN Web Docs](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element)

nodes.title: HTML Canvas
nodes.desc: Understand how to use the canvas element to create dynamic graphics in HTML. [W3Schools](https://www.w3schools.com/html/html5_canvas.asp)

nodes.title: HTML SVG
nodes.desc: Learn how to use SVG to create scalable vector graphics in HTML. [MDN Web Docs](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/SVG)

nodes.title: HTML CSS
nodes.desc: Understand how to use CSS to style and layout HTML elements. [W3Schools](https://www.w3schools.com/css/)

nodes.title: HTML JavaScript
nodes.desc: Learn how to use JavaScript to add interactivity to HTML elements. [MDN Web Docs](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript)

nodes.title: HTML Responsive Design
nodes.desc: Understand how to create responsive designs in HTML using media queries and flexible grids. [W3Schools](https://www.w3schools.com/css/css_rwd_intro.asp)

nodes.title: HTML Accessibility
nodes.desc: Learn how to create accessible HTML documents using ARIA attributes and semantic elements. [MDN Web Docs](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/Accessibility)

nodes.title: HTML Validation
nodes.desc: Understand how to validate HTML documents using the W3C Markup Validation Service. [W3C](https://validator.w3.org/)

nodes.title: HTML Best Practices
nodes.desc: Learn about best practices for writing clean, maintainable, and efficient HTML code. [MDN Web Docs](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Best_practices)

nodes.title: HTML Attributes
nodes.desc: Understand how to use attributes to provide additional information about HTML elements, such as id, class, and style. [W3Schools](https://www.w3schools.com/html/html_attributes.asp)

nodes.title: HTML Semantic Elements
nodes.desc: Learn about the different semantic elements in HTML, including header, nav, main, section, article, and footer. [MDN Web Docs](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element#Semantic_elements)

nodes.title: HTML Forms
nodes.desc: Understand how to create forms in HTML, including input fields, labels, and buttons. [W3Schools](https://www.w3schools.com/html/html_forms.asp)

nodes.title: HTML Tables
nodes.desc: Learn how to create tables in HTML, including table headers, rows, and cells. [MDN Web Docs](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/table)

nodes.title: HTML Lists
nodes.desc: Understand how to create ordered and unordered lists in HTML. [W3Schools](https://www.w3schools.com/html/html_lists.asp)

nodes.title: HTML Links
nodes.desc: Learn how to create links in HTML, including internal and external links. [MDN Web Docs](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/a)

nodes.title: HTML Images
nodes.desc: Understand how to add images to an HTML document, including the img tag and alt attribute. [W3Schools](https://www.w3schools.com/html/html_images.asp)

nodes.title: HTML Audio and Video
nodes.desc: Learn how to add audio and video to an HTML document, including the audio and video tags. [MDN Web Docs](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/audio)
